title: Best of The Herd: 09/05/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/05/2018
description:
Colin thinks the Packers are the big loser in the Khalil Mack trade and explains why. He thinks the Cowboys biggest problem isn't on their roster or even a member of the organization. Plus, Super Bowl Champion and former Linebacker Bryan Cox comes in studio to talk about the Steelers lack of recent success and why he thinks the Giants are setting up for another disappointing season. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
